Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Alkaline Phosphatase Flex reagent cartridge (ALPI)
Regulation Name(s): Alkaline phosphatase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Dimension Alkaline Phosphatase Flex reagent cartridge and Calibrator for quantitative measurement and calibration of alkaline phosphatase on Dimension clinical chemistry systems
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for quantitative measurement of alkaline phosphatase in human serum and plasma on the Dimension clinical chemistry system; calibrator used for calibration of alkaline phosphatase method
